info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 8:20PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Mecklenburg and southwestern Union Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 819 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Indian Land, or near Weddington, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Indian Trail, Weddington, Wesley Chapel, Waxhaw, Lake Park, Mineral Springs, Marvin, Stallings and South Charlotte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
